# [Ethical Fashion Dashboard](https://github.com/aspenjack/Ethical-Fashion/blob/main/Ethical-Fashion_v1.ipynb){target="_blank"}

<p style="font-size: 25px; text-align:left;">Interactive dashboard exploring sustainability and fair wage practices of various fashion companies and their headquarters</p>
-------------------------------- 
Contains visualizations of 5 key metrics related to sustainability and fair wage practices. End-to-end process includes **sourcing data** from [Fashion Revolution](https://www.fashionrevolution.org/about/transparency/), **cleaning and formatting** in Python, **loading into PostgreSQL** via SQLAlchemy, **creating a Flask App** to link PostgreSQL database, **constructing a website** using JavaScript, Bootstrap, and HTML, and **creating visualizations** using D3, Plotly, and Leaflet.

# [Visualizing Collisions](https://aspenjack.github.io/US-Transportation-Accidents/){target="_blank"}

<p style="font-size: 25px; text-align:center">Exploratory analysis of traffic accidents in the United States between 2016-2022 </p>
---------------------------------
Analyzes numerous potentially influential factors related to traffic accidents such as weather, time of day, location, temperature, etc. Utilizes the Census API to standardize city size based on population, ensuring a uniform basis for comparing accident rates across cities. End-to-end process includes **sourcing data** from [Kaggle](https://www.kaggle.com/datasets/sobhanmoosavi/us-accidents/data){target="_blank"}, **incorporating the Census API** to standardize city size, **cleaning, merging, and formatting** data in Python, and **visualizing** the results graphically.

# [Citi Bike Tableau Dashboards](https://public.tableau.com/app/profile/aspen.jack/viz/CitiBike_17044956173510/EndStations){target="_blank"}

<p style="font-size: 25px; text-align:center">Interactive dashboards and visualizations exploring Citi Bike user behavior during August 2019</p>
-------------------------------
The [Gender Dashboard](https://public.tableau.com/views/CitiBike_17044956173510/GenderDashboard?:language=en-US&:display_count=n&:origin=viz_share_link){target="_blank"} explores gender's role in Citi Bike user interactions while the [Age Dashboard](https://public.tableau.com/views/CitiBike_17044956173510/AgeDashboard?:language=en-US&:display_count=n&:origin=viz_share_link){target="_blank"} investigates how age influences rider behavior in the Citi Bike system. Additional visualizations in this project delve into different facets of consumer conduct to gain further business  insight.

# [Visualizing Earthquakes](https://aspenjack.github.io/Visualizing-Earthquakes-Leaflet/){target="_blank"}

<p style="font-size: 25px; text-align:center">Interactive geomap of earthquakes around the world</p>
-------------------------------- 
Utilizes Leaflet combined with a USGS GeoJSON API to map each earthquake around the world that occurred in the past 7 days, updated every minute. Popups allow clickable points that display information about the chosen earthquake. For interactivity, click [here](https://aspenjack.github.io/Visualizing-Earthquakes-Leaflet/).

![](leaflet_earthquakes.png)
